thread.title: The Official Photos Of The Crowd Size At President Trump’s Inauguration
thread.title_full: The Official Photos Of The Crowd Size At President Trump’s Inauguration

author: Kaitlan Collins
title: The Official Photos Of The Crowd Size At President Trump’s Inauguration
text:
TOP 5518423 
The National Park Service has released hundreds of photos of the crowd size at President Trump’s inauguration in Washington in late January. (Photo: National Park Service) 
Several of the shots were from aerial views, and show how many people were gathered on the National Mall to watch Trump’s swearing in on Jan. 20th. (Photo: National Park Service) (Photo: National Park Service) 
The photos were released because of a Freedom of Information Act request made by several media outlets. (Photo: National Park Service) (Photo: National Park Service) 
There is no official crowd count for how many people attended the inauguration because the National Park Service stopped releasing numbers after the Million Man March in 1995. However, the president claims at least 1.5 million people were there, though there is no way to confirm that number. (Photo: National Park Service)
